Module io.github.pustike.eventbus

Package io.github.pustike.eventbus

EventBus allows publish-subscribe-style communication between components without requiring components to explicitly register with one another (and thus be aware of each other).
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SubscriberLoader
    Cache for subscriberMethods that are annotated with @Subscribe in a given class and all its super-classes.
    TypeSupplier
    Provides the event type to be applied for generic events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeadEvent
    Wraps an event that was posted, but which had no subscribers and thus could not be delivered.
    DefaultSubscriberLoader
    Default Cache that uses ConcurrentHashMap to store subscribeMethods and eventType hierarchy.
    Dispatcher
    Handler for dispatching events to subscribers, providing different event ordering guarantees that make sense for different situations.
    EventBus
    Dispatches events to listeners, and provides ways for listeners to register themselves.
    ExceptionEvent
    When any exceptions occur on the bus during handler execution, this event will be published.
    TypedEvent<T>
    Typed event that provides the type of source object used.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Subscribe
    Marks a method as an event subscriber.
